data.eml:eml: The first fossil Dufoureillini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Anthocoridae: Lyctocorinae) from the Eocene Baltic amber

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Popov, Yuri A., Herczek, Aleksander, Ek, Jola Bro Ż (2011): The first fossil Dufoureillini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Anthocoridae: Lyctocorinae) from the Eocene Baltic amber. Zootaxa 2760: 53-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.276807
